faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Spain permits unrestricted property ownership for foreign nationals regardless of residency status or nationality. The purchase process involves acquiring a Spanish tax identification number (NIE), conducting property inspections, and engaging registered legal representation. International buyers receive equal legal protections to Spanish citizens. Currency exchange and international fund transfers are straightforward through established banking channels supporting cross-border transactions.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Beyond purchase price, international buyers should budget approximately 8-12% for acquisition costs including: 6-7% transfer tax (ITP), notary fees (0.5-1%), legal representation (0.5-1%), and property registration. Annual ownership costs include property tax (IBI) averaging 0.4-1.1% of property value, plus utilities and maintenance. This villa's €518,000 purchase would involve approximately €41,500-€62,000 in initial acquisition costs. Professional legal representation ensures transparency and protects buyer interests throughout the transaction process.

Property maintenance and annual taxes remain modest. International residents typically report 30-40% cost reductions compared to UK or Northern European equivalents, enabling comfortable lifestyles at modest expense while maintaining international service accessibility.
